slides.title: Pollution Types
slides.content:
**Air:** Vehicle emissions, factories, smoke
**Water:** Industrial waste, sewage, oil spills (Navy fights these!)
**Soil:** Chemicals, pesticides, garbage
**Noise:** Loud sounds, traffic
**Effects:** Health issues, climate change

slides.title: Conservation
slides.content:
**3Rs:** Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
**Save Water:** Turn off taps, fix leaks
**Save Energy:** Switch off lights, use LED
**Wildlife:** Protect forests, animals
**Marine Life:** Ocean conservation (Important for Navy!)

slides.title: Ecosystem
slides.content:
**Components:** Biotic (living) + Abiotic (non-living)
**Food Web:** Complex food relationships
**Balance:** All organisms depend on each other
**Biodiversity:** Variety of life forms
